item.name: LOG
item.sql: UPDATE LOG SET ANNOTATOR=?,START_DTM=?, END_DTM=?, NUM_NOTES=?, COMMENTS=? WHERE RUN_ID=?

item.name: ANNOTATION_TABLE

item:
CREATE TABLE {tableName}(ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
                    DOC_NAME TEXT,
                    ANNOTATOR TEXT,
                    RUN_ID INT,
                    TYPE TEXT,
                    BEGIN INT,
                    END INT,
                    SNIPPET_BEGIN INT,
                    TEXT TEXT,
                    FEATURES TEXT,
                    SNIPPET TEXT,
                    COMMENTS TEXT,
                    CREATE_DTM DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP);
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS {tableName}_RUN_IND ON {tableName} (RUN_ID);
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS {tableName}_TYPE_IND ON {tableName} (TYPE);
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS {tableName}_ANNO_IND ON {tableName} (ANNOTATOR);
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS {tableName}_DOC_IND ON {tableName} (DOC_NAME);

CREATE TABLE {tableName} (
                    DOC_ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
                    DATASET_ID CHAR(10),
                    BUNCH_ID INTEGER,
                    DOC_NAME TEXT,
                    TEXT TEXT,
                    DATE DATETIME,
                    REF_DATE DATETIME,
                    INSERT_DTM DATETIME);
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS {tableName}_DOC_IND ON {tableName} (DOC_NAME);
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS {tableName}_DATATSET_IND ON {tableName} (DATASET_ID);
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS {tableName}_BUNCH_IND ON {tableName} (BUNCH_ID);

sql.item:
CREATE TABLE LOG (
                    RUN_ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
                    ANNOTATOR TEXT,
                    START_DTM DATETIME,
                    END_DTM DATETIME,
                    NUM_NOTES NUMBER(22,0),
                    COMMENTS TEXT);

item:
CREATE TABLE ANNOTATORS (
                    ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
                    ANNOTATOR TEXT,
                    ADD_DTM DATETIME);
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS ANNOTATORS_INX ON ANNOTATORS (ANNOTATOR);

item.name: queryDocs
item.sql: SELECT DOC_ID,DATASET_ID, DOC_NAME, BUNCH_ID, TEXT SNIPPET,TEXT DOC_TEXT, DATE,REF_DATE, INSERT_DTM FROM {tableName}

item.name: queryAnnos
item.sql:
SELECT ID,DOC_NAME,TYPE,SNIPPET,BEGIN,END,SNIPPET_BEGIN,TEXT,FEATURES,COMMENTS,ANNOTATOR,RUN_ID FROM
                {tableName} RS

item.name: querySnippetAnnos
item.sql:
SELECT RS.ID,RS.DOC_NAME, RS.TYPE,RS.SNIPPET, RS.BEGIN,RS.END,RS.SNIPPET_BEGIN,IT.TEXT DOC_TEXT,
                RS.FEATURES,IT.DATE, IT.REF_DATE,RS.COMMENTS,RS.ANNOTATOR,RS.RUN_ID FROM
                {tableName} RS JOIN {inputTable} IT ON RS.DOC_NAME=IT.DOC_NAME

item.name: queryDocSnippetAnnos
item.sql:
SELECT RD.ID,IT.BUNCH_ID,RD.DOC_NAME,RD.TYPE DOC_TYPE, RS.ID RSID, RS.TYPE,RS.SNIPPET,RS.BEGIN,RS.END,RS.SNIPPET_BEGIN,IT.TEXT DOC_TEXT,
                RS.FEATURES,IT.DATE, IT.REF_DATE,RS.COMMENTS,RD.ANNOTATOR,RD.RUN_ID
                FROM
                {docResultTable} RD LEFT OUTER JOIN {tableName} RS ON RD.DOC_NAME=RS.DOC_NAME JOIN {inputTable} IT ON RD.DOC_NAME=IT.DOC_NAME

item.name: queryBunchDocSnippetAnnos
item.sql:
SELECT RD.ID ,IT.BUNCH_ID,RD.DOC_NAME,RB.TYPE BUNCH_TYPE, RD.TYPE DOC_TYPE, RS.TYPE,RS.SNIPPET,RS.BEGIN,RS.END,RS.SNIPPET_BEGIN,
                RS.FEATURES,IT.DATE, IT.REF_DATE,RS.COMMENTS,RS.ANNOTATOR,RB.RUN_ID
                FROM {bunchResultTable} RB JOIN {inputTable} IT ON RB.DOC_NAME=IT.BUNCH_ID
                JOIN {docResultTable} RD ON IT.DOC_NAME=RD.DOC_NAME
                LEFT OUTER JOIN {tableName} RS ON RD.DOC_NAME=RS.DOC_NAME

item.name: exportExcel
item.sql: SELECT ID,{tableName}.DOC_NAME,TYPE,SNIPPET,BEGIN,END,FEATURES FROM {tableName}

item.name: queryCount
item.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM {tableName}

item.name: queryAnnotators
item.sql: SELECT ANNOTATOR FROM ANNOTATORS;

item.name: checkAnnotatorExist
item.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ANNOTATORS WHERE ANNOTATOR=?

item.name: getColumnsInfo
item.sql: PRAGMA table_info({tableName});

item.name: checkTableExists
item.sql: select count(*) from sqlite_master where type='table' and name=?;

item.name: lastIdofLOG
item.sql: SELECT RUN_ID FROM LOG ORDER BY RUN_ID DESC LIMIT 1;

item.name: masterInputQuery
item.sql: SELECT DOC_ID, DATASET_ID,BUNCH_ID,DOC_NAME,TEXT,DATE,REF_DATE FROM {tableName} WHERE DATASET_ID = ?;

item.name: masterCountQuery
item.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM {tableName} WHERE DATASET_ID = ?;

item.name: maxRunIDofAnnotator
item.sql: SELECT MAX(RUN_ID) FROM {tableName} WHERE ANNOTATOR=?

item.name: lastLogRunID
item.sql: SELECT MAX(RUN_ID) FROM LOG WHERE ANNOTATOR=?

item.name: logQuery
item.sql: SELECT RUN_ID, START_DTM, END_DTM, NUM_NOTES, COMMENTS FROM LOG WHERE RUN_ID=?;

item.name: maxRunID
item.sql: SELECT MAX(RUN_ID) FROM {tableName} WHERE ANNOTATOR=?

item.name: LOG
item.sql: INSERT INTO LOG (ANNOTATOR, START_DTM, END_DTM, NUM_NOTES, COMMENTS) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?)

item.name: ANNOTATORS
item.sql: INSERT INTO ANNOTATORS (ANNOTATOR, ADD_DTM) VALUES (?,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)

item.name: limit
item.sql: LIMIT
